name: Anthology Studies
description: Anthology answers the question: What should we study next?  Small group, Bible study, community or life groupwhatever you call the circle of people you meet with to study Scriptureone thing is true: the greatest discussions center around engaging content.  Anthology is a digital collection of group study materials created and tested by North Point Ministries. With premium videos, challenging exercises, and discussion questions guaranteed to spark meaningful conversations, youll create an environment ripe (primed) for life change and spiritual growth with almost no preparation.  FEATURES - 100% Free Video Content - Videos Aiming at 20 minutes or less in length - Some Videos Include Free Study Guides - 18-Month Study Plans for Various Types of Groups  This app requires a mobile internet or Wi-Fi connection.   The Anthology App is populated with content written and created by the North Point Ministries team. For more information, please visit anthology.study.   Copyright: App:  2016 Subsplash, Content:  2016 North Point Ministries
